sauces.name: Zesta - Tomato Sauce
sauces.description: Zesta Tomato Sauce is made from 100% real tomatoes and fortified with Vitamin E, providing 20% of your daily requirement per serving. This trusted Kenyan brand from Trufoods has been a household favourite for nearly 60 years, perfect for enhancing chips, nyama choma, and everyday meals. Available in multiple sizes including convenient 1kg packs for wholesale in Kenya.

sauces.name: Zesta - Chilli Sauce
sauces.description: Zesta Chilli Sauce brings the perfect kick of heat using selected chilli peppers, vinegar, and aromatic spices, all fortified with Vitamin E. Ideal for samosas, chips masala, and grilled meats like nyama choma, this trusted Kenyan sauce has been a favourite across East and Central Africa for generations.

sauces.name: Zesta - Hot & Sweet Sauce
sauces.description: Zesta Hot & Sweet Sauce delivers the perfect balance of spicy and sweet flavours, making it an irresistible dipping sauce for snacks and street foods. Made with natural colours and vitamin enrichment by Trufoods Kenya, it comes in a convenient 400g format ideal for both home use and food service.

sauces.name: Zesta - Tomato Ketchup
sauces.description: Zesta Tomato Ketchup is a classic favourite enriched with Vitamin E and made using only natural colours. As Kenya's trusted ketchup brand for over six decades, it pairs perfectly with chips, burgers, and all your favourite snacks. Available wholesale across Kenya for retailers and food businesses.

sauces.name: Zesta - Choma Sauce
sauces.description: Zesta Choma Sauce captures the authentic smoky flavour of nyama choma, blending ripe tomatoes with spices, garlic, and lemon notes. This BBQ-inspired sauce from Trufoods Kenya is perfect for grilled meats, burgers, and hotdogs, available in 250g and 400g sizes for both retail and wholesale.

sauces.name: Zesta - Tomato Garlic Sauce
sauces.description: Zesta Tomato Garlic Sauce combines rich tomato flavour with aromatic garlic, creating a versatile sauce for pasta, pizza, and traditional Kenyan dishes. Made by Trufoods, this kitchen essential adds depth and flavour to both everyday cooking and special meals.

sauces.name: Zesta - Chilli Garlic Sauce
sauces.description: Zesta Chilli Garlic Sauce pairs fiery chilli heat with pungent garlic for a bold flavour profile. Perfect for Asian-inspired stir-fries, marinades, and local Kenyan favourites, this versatile sauce from Trufoods Kenya elevates any dish that needs an extra kick.

sauces.name: Zesta - Mayonnaise
sauces.description: Zesta Mayonnaise is a creamy, eggless formula suitable for vegetarians and those with egg allergies. This trusted Kenyan mayonnaise is perfect for sandwiches, salads, and chips, available in 12x340g cartons for wholesale distribution across Kenya.

sauces.name: Zesta - Mayocue
sauces.description: Zesta Mayocue blends creamy mayonnaise with smoky BBQ sauce in one convenient bottle. Perfect for burgers, chips, and grilled foods, this Trufoods Kenya innovation saves time without compromising on that classic mayo-barbecue combination Kenyans love.

sauces.name: Zesta - Yellow Mustard
sauces.description: Zesta Yellow Mustard delivers classic tangy flavour that brightens sandwiches, hotdogs, and salad dressings. Made by Trufoods Kenya, this kitchen essential brings authentic mustard taste to your favourite foods at home or in food service.

sauces.name: Zesta - Chilli Tamarind Sauce
sauces.description: Zesta Chilli Tamarind Sauce combines sweet-sour tamarind with chilli heat, creating the perfect accompaniment for bhajias, samosas, and street food. This nostalgic Kenyan flavour from Trufoods has been a beloved taste many grew up enjoying with family.

sauces.name: Zesta - Fruit Spicy Sauce
sauces.description: Zesta Fruit Spicy Sauce blends fruity sweetness with aromatic spices for a unique flavour profile. This versatile sauce from Trufoods Kenya works beautifully on grilled meats, snacks, and fusion dishes, adding a distinctive sweet-spicy accent.

sauces.name: Zesta - Mango Chutney
sauces.description: Zesta Mango Chutney features ripe mangoes blended with sugar and spices, creating the classic Kenyan accompaniment for bhajias, curries, and grilled meats. Available in 450g jars, this Trufoods favourite brings authentic taste to every meal.

sauces.name: Zesta - Fruit Chutney
sauces.description: Zesta Fruit Chutney offers a delightful sweet and tangy blend of mixed fruits, perfect for pairing with sandwiches, nyama choma, and snacks. Made by Trufoods Kenya, this versatile chutney adds a fruity accent to both everyday and special occasions.

condiments.name: Zesta - Gravy Browning
condiments.description: Zesta Gravy Browning is a KEBS quality kitchen essential that adds rich colour and depth to soups, stews, gravies, and sauces. Available in 700ml bottles, this trusted Trufoods Kenya product has been helping Kenyan cooks create visually appealing dishes for decades.

canned-food.description: Kenylon chickpeas are a versatile pantry staple for hummus, curries, and fresh salads. These convenient canned vegetables eliminate soaking and long cooking times, making healthy meal prep effortless. Made in Kenya since 1949 with consistent quality you can trust.

rice.description: Sunrice biryani rice is Kenya's top choice for authentic biryani dishes, featuring long, slender grains with excellent aroma. This premium Kenya rice absorbs spices beautifully, delivering restaurant-quality biryani at home. Specially selected for perfect texture every time.

rice.name: Sunrice - Pishori Rice
rice.description: Authentic pishori rice grown in the Mwea Region by the Tana River, renowned for its natural sweetness and distinctive aroma. This premium Kenya rice is a local favourite, perfect for everyday meals from simple wali to celebratory pilau. A true taste of Kenya.

sweets.name: KSL - Tropical Mints
sweets.description: Tropical Mints from Kenya Sweets Limited have been Kenya's iconic breath freshener since 1954. The unique sweet-minty flavour, crafted for East African tastes, also aids digestion. From East Africa's oldest confectionery established in 1943, a true generational favourite.

sweets.name: KSL - White Mints
sweets.description: Classic White Mints offer refreshing breath freshening with a clean, cool taste Kenyans have loved for over 80 years. These traditional mints also support healthy digestion. A timeless confectionery from Kenya Sweets Limited's heritage collection.

sweets.name: KSL - Cough Drops
sweets.description: KSL Cough Drops provide soothing throat relief when you need it most. Made by Kenya Sweets Limited with the same quality standards behind their 80-year confectionery legacy. Keep a pack handy during cold seasons for the whole family.

sweets.name: KSL - OK Fruit Drops
sweets.description: OK Fruit Drops offer assorted fruity flavours from East Africa's oldest sweet maker. These colourful confections have delighted generations alongside the famous Tropical Mints. A nostalgic treat perfect for sharing with family and friends.

sweets.name: KSL - Orange Fruit Drops
sweets.description: Orange Fruit Drops deliver real citrus taste in every sweet. From Kenya Sweets Limited, a confectionery brand trusted since 1943, these tangy treats are perfect for satisfying sweet cravings with a burst of orange flavour.

drinks.name: Highlands - Water
drinks.description: Highlands bottled water is sourced from Nyeri's pristine high-altitude springs, ensuring exceptional purity and taste. With 70 years of beverage expertise, Highlands delivers hydration you can trust. Available from 500ml PET bottles to 20L jumbo containers for homes and offices.

drinks.name: Highlands - Orange Cordial
drinks.description: Highlands Orange Cordial has been a Kenyan household favourite since 1986, offering pure fruit concentrate with excellent mixing ratios. Perfect for family gatherings, kids' parties, or everyday refreshment. Available in economical 1L, 2L, 3L, and 5L sizes.

drinks.name: Highlands - Mango Cordial
drinks.description: Highlands Mango Cordial contains 20% Mango Pulp Concentrate plus premium Alphonso Mango Pulp for rich tropical flavour. This concentrated cordial delivers authentic mango taste backed by 70 years of beverage expertise. Available in 1L to 5L family sizes.

drinks.name: Highlands - Tropical Cordial
drinks.description: Highlands Tropical Cordial blends 35% fruit concentrate from pineapple, papaya, kiwi, mango, guava, passion fruit, orange, and banana. A household favourite for decades, perfect for breakfast, parties, and everyday refreshment. Available in 1L to 5L sizes.

drinks.name: Highlands - Pineapple Cordial
drinks.description: Highlands Pineapple Cordial delivers refreshing pineapple flavour made with Nyeri's high-quality water since 1954. This concentrated juice is perfect for family gatherings and everyday refreshment. Available in sizes up to 5L for economical value.

drinks.name: Club - Cola
drinks.description: Club Cola is a locally-produced Kenyan cola from Highlands Drinks, offering familiar refreshment with local pride since 2014. Perfect for meals, parties, and everyday enjoyment. Available in 350ml, 500ml, 1.25L, and 2L bottles.

drinks.name: Club - Orange
drinks.description: Club Orange soda brings citrus refreshment backed by Highlands' 70 years of beverage expertise. Launched in 2014, this locally-made orange soda is perfect for family meals and social gatherings. Available in multiple convenient bottle sizes.

drinks.name: Club - Tangawizi
drinks.description: Club Tangawizi delivers distinctly African ginger soda flavour from Highlands Drinks. This spicy-sweet refreshment is perfect for those who love bold, traditional tastes. Available in 350ml to 2L formats for personal enjoyment or sharing.

drinks.name: Bountyful - Lemonade
drinks.description: Bountyful Lemonade offers refreshing citrus taste from a proudly Kenyan brand. This crisp lemonade is perfect for hot days, family meals, or as a mixer for entertaining guests.

drinks.name: Club - Lemon Lime
drinks.description: Club Lemon Lime has been delivering crisp citrus refreshment since its 2014 launch, backed by Highlands' 70 years of beverage expertise. Perfect as a standalone drink or versatile mixer. Available in 350ml to 2L bottles.

drinks.name: Club - Lemonade
drinks.description: Club Lemonade has become a Kenyan favourite both as a refreshing drink and a popular mixer for entertaining. The perfect balance of sweet and citrus from Highlands Drinks. Available in standard Club packaging sizes.

drinks.name: Club - Blackcurrant
drinks.description: Club Blackcurrant joined the Club range in 2016, offering bold fruity flavour with its distinctive purple colour. A refreshing choice for those seeking something different. Available in 350ml, 500ml, 1.25L, and 2L bottles.

drinks.name: Bazuu - Energy
drinks.description: Bazuu Energy drink from Highlands is made specifically for the Kenyan market, delivering the boost you need for busy days. Available in 265ml and 500ml bottles, sold in convenient 12-bottle cartons for wholesale buyers.

drinks.name: Club - Club Lemonade
drinks.description: Club Lemonade offers zesty refreshment from Highlands Drinks, equally enjoyable on its own or as a versatile mixer for social occasions. Backed by 70 years of Kenyan beverage manufacturing experience.

tea.name: Ketepa - Pride
tea.description: Ketepa Pride features finer granules for full, fast infusion from select gardens across Kenya's Green Rift Valley. This premium Kenyan tea has been trusted since 1978 for authentic chai time. Available in loose tea, tagged and untagged tea bags, and catering packs.

tea.name: Safari - Pure Tea
tea.description: Safari Pure Tea represents Ketepa's finest blend, with top quality leaves handpicked from Kenya's best highland tea gardens. Over 35 years of expert blending delivers exceptional flavour in every cup. Available in 250g, 500g, 1kg loose tea and 100-count tea bags.

tea.name: Melvins - Ginger Tea
tea.description: Melvins Ginger Tea combines premium Kenyan black tea with natural ginger for a warming, aromatic brew. Perfect for morning chai time or soothing evening refreshment. Available in both loose leaf and convenient tea bag formats.

tea.name: Melvins - Masala Tea
tea.description: Melvins Masala Tea blends premium Kenyan black tea with ginger, cinnamon, cloves, and cardamom for authentic masala chai flavour. This aromatic fusion of Kenyan highland tea and traditional Indian spices is perfect for chai lovers. Available in loose leaf and tea bags.

tea.name: Fahari - Black Tea
tea.description: Fahari ya Kenya is Kenya's number one trusted tea brand from Ketepa, winner of multiple awards from 2022-2025. Blended from East and West Rift Valley highland tea gardens, this premium Kenyan tea is rich in antioxidants and theanine for a superior chai experience.

tea.name: Ketepa - Ginger Tea
tea.description: Ketepa Ginger Tea combines premium Kenyan black tea with natural ginger for a warming brew with digestive benefits. Part of Ketepa's popular flavoured range, perfect for cold mornings or soothing evening chai time.

tea.name: Ketepa - Masala Tea
tea.description: Ketepa Masala Tea delivers authentic chai flavour with premium Kenyan black tea infused with cardamom, cinnamon, ginger, and cloves. This ISO certified masala tea brings the classic Kenyan chai experience to your cup every time.

tea.name: Ketepa - Lemon Green Tea
tea.description: Ketepa Lemon Green Tea offers a lighter alternative to black tea with natural lemon flavour and antioxidant benefits. Perfect for health-conscious tea lovers seeking refreshing variety from Kenya's leading tea brand.

tea.name: Ketepa - Flavoured Hexagonal Pack
tea.description: Ketepa's Flavoured Hexagonal Pack is the perfect tea gift set featuring 11 varieties: Lemon, Ginger, Masala, Forest Fruit, Cinnamon, Caramel, Mint, Mango, Orange, Earl Grey, and Jasmine. Each tea bag is individually enveloped for freshness.

toilet-paper.name: Velvex
toilet-paper.description: Velvex soft tissue is made from 100% virgin pulp by Chandaria Industries with advanced 2-ply laminated technology and absorbent gel layer. This premium toilet paper is 100% biodegradable, combining luxury softness with environmental responsibility. Over 50 years of trusted manufacturing.

toilet-paper.name: Nice & Soft
toilet-paper.description: Nice and Soft is East Africa's number one toilet tissue, crafted from 100% virgin pulp by Chandaria Industries. Known for exceptional strength, softness, and absorbency, this 2-ply tissue delivers premium comfort for the whole family.

toilet-paper.name: Toilex
toilet-paper.description: Toilex is Kenya's most popular tissue brand, made from 100% recycled paper for eco-conscious households. This soft tissue offers the perfect balance of softness, strength, and absorbency while being 100% biodegradable. Wholesale Kenya trusted from Chandaria Industries.

toilet-paper.name: Rosy
toilet-paper.description: Rosy is Kenya's first toilet tissue brand with over 50 years of heritage. Made from 100% recycled paper waste, this affordable family pack option delivers extra strength without compromising value. From Chandaria Industries, Kenya's tissue pioneers.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Black Pepper
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat pure black pepper brings bold, aromatic heat to your nyama choma, stews, and marinades. This authentic Kenyan spice contains no additives and is ISO 22000:2005 certified for quality you can trust in every dish.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Cardamoms
pure-spices.description: Known as the Queen of Spices, Tropical Heat cardamom pods deliver the aromatic complexity essential for authentic chai, biryani, and homemade garam masala. These pure spices with no additives create that traditional recipe flavor Kenyans love.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Cayenne Pepper
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat cayenne pepper delivers concentrated heat and vibrant color to your curries, sauces, and nyama choma marinades. This pure spice contains no additives, just authentic Kenyan quality for recipes that demand real fire.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Chilli Flakes
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat chilli flakes give you control over the heat in your pilau, pizza, and pasta dishes. Sprinkle these aromatic crushed chilies as a finishing touch or work them into marinades for that perfect kick.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Chillies
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat ground chillies are roasted and finely ground for consistent heat and deep red color in your traditional recipes. These pure spices contain no fillers, delivering authentic Kenyan flavor to curries and stews.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Cinnamon
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat cinnamon adds sweet, warming notes to your chai, pilau, and biryani dishes. This pure spice with no additives is essential for authentic Kenyan spice blends and traditional recipes that call for aromatic warmth.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Cloves
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat cloves are intensely aromatic, perfect for pilau, biryani, chai masala, and homemade garam masala. These pure spices bring authentic East African depth to your traditional recipes with natural preservative properties.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Coriander
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat roasted coriander offers citrusy, slightly sweet notes that form the backbone of curry powder and pilau masala blends. This 100% natural pure spice is essential for authentic Kenyan curries and marinades.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Cumin
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat cumin delivers warm, earthy depth to your pilau, biryani, and meat preparations. This pure spice with no additives is fundamental to authentic Kenyan cooking and essential for traditional recipe masala blends.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Garlic Powder
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat garlic powder dissolves easily into marinades and nyama choma rubs when fresh garlic is not practical. This 100% pure spice delivers consistent aromatic flavor to your seasoning blends and traditional recipes.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Ginger
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat ground ginger brings warming, aromatic depth to your chai, curries, and baking. This pure spice contains no additives and adds authentic Kenyan flavor with natural anti-inflammatory benefits.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Nutmeg
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat nutmeg offers warm, sweet notes perfect for chai masala, desserts, and aromatic spice blends. This pure spice with no additives adds sophistication to both sweet and savory traditional recipes.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Onion Powder
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat onion powder provides concentrated savory flavor for rubs, seasonings, and quick weeknight cooking. This 100% pure spice is perfect when you need that aromatic onion depth without the prep time.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Paprika
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat paprika adds mild, sweet pepper flavor and rich red color to stews, rice dishes, and grilled meats. This pure spice with no additives is a versatile addition to your authentic Kenyan kitchen.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - Turmeric
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat turmeric brings golden color and earthy depth to your curries, pilau, and biryani. This pure spice contains no additives and is rich in natural curcumin for authentic Kenyan recipes with health benefits.

pure-spices.name: Tropical Heat - White Pepper
pure-spices.description: Tropical Heat white pepper delivers subtle heat without dark specks, ideal for light-colored sauces, soups, and seafood dishes. This 100% pure spice is a refined choice for traditional recipes requiring delicate seasoning.

seasonings.name: Tropical Heat - Biryani Masala
seasonings.description: Tropical Heat biryani masala blends cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, and aromatic spices for authentic layered rice dishes. This traditional recipe seasoning brings the rich, fragrant flavor of restaurant-quality biryani to your home kitchen.

seasonings.name: Tropical Heat - Chilli Lemon
seasonings.description: Tropical Heat chilli lemon seasoning pairs tangy citrus with spicy heat for grilled meats, nyama choma, and roasted vegetables. This versatile blend also transforms chips, popcorn, and salads into bold, flavorful snacks.

seasonings.name: Tropical Heat - Dhana Jeera
seasonings.description: Tropical Heat dhana jeera combines roasted coriander and cumin in traditional proportions used across Kenyan and Indian kitchens. This aromatic foundation blend creates authentic curry powder depth for vegetable dishes and lentils.

seasonings.name: Tropical Heat - Garam Masala
seasonings.description: Tropical Heat garam masala blends cloves, cinnamon, cardamom, and warming spices for that authentic finishing touch. Add this aromatic seasoning at the end of cooking to bring traditional recipe depth to your curries and meat dishes.

seasonings.name: Tropical Heat - Mixed Spices
seasonings.description: Tropical Heat mixed spices is an all-purpose blend for everyday Kenyan cooking. This aromatic seasoning saves time on measuring while delivering consistent flavor to your meats, stews, rice dishes, and soups.

seasonings.name: Tropical Heat - Mixed Spices for Wet and Dry
seasonings.description: Tropical Heat mixed spices for wet and dry works equally well in curries and stews as it does in dry rubs for nyama choma. This versatile aromatic blend simplifies your spice rack while delivering authentic Kenyan flavor across cooking methods.

seasonings.name: Tropical Heat - Peri Peri
seasonings.description: Tropical Heat peri peri brings the fiery, tangy flavor of African-Portuguese cooking to your kitchen. This aromatic blend of Bird's Eye chili, garlic, and lemon transforms chicken, nyama choma, and grilled vegetables into bold, memorable dishes.

seasonings.name: Tropical Heat - Pilau Masala
seasonings.description: Tropical Heat pilau masala is the authentic Kenyan spice blend that makes perfect pilau every time. This aromatic mix of cumin, cardamom, cloves, and black pepper contains no preservatives, just pure traditional recipe flavor.

seasonings.name: Tropical Heat - Salad Seasoning
seasonings.description: Tropical Heat salad seasoning blends herbs, sesame seeds, and savory spices for fresh, vibrant dishes. This aromatic mix elevates salads, grilled vegetables, and light meals with balanced, restaurant-quality flavor.

seasonings.name: Tropical Heat - Tea Masala
seasonings.description: Tropical Heat tea masala blends cardamom, ginger, cinnamon, and cloves for authentic masala chai. Simply add this aromatic mix to your black tea for that traditional recipe warmth Kenyans have loved for generations.

salts.name: Tropical Heat - Citric Acid
salts.description: Tropical Heat citric acid is a food-grade crystalline powder for preserving, baking, and enhancing flavor. This versatile kitchen essential prevents browning in fruits, activates baking soda, and extends shelf life in home canning.

salts.name: Tropical Heat - Meat Tenderiser
salts.description: Tropical Heat meat tenderiser uses natural enzymes to transform economical cuts into tender, flavorful dishes. Apply as a dry rub or mix into your nyama choma marinades to break down tough fibers before grilling.

herbs.name: Tropical Heat - Basil
herbs.description: Tropical Heat dried basil brings aromatic, slightly sweet flavor to your Italian herbs collection. This essential cooking herb elevates tomato-based sauces, pizza, and pasta with that authentic Mediterranean taste.

herbs.name: Tropical Heat - Bay Leaves
herbs.description: Tropical Heat bay leaves release their herbal-floral aroma gradually into your pilau, stews, and slow-cooked dishes. These dried herbs are essential for building depth in stocks, braises, and traditional Kenyan rice preparations.

herbs.name: Tropical Heat - Marjoram
herbs.description: Tropical Heat marjoram offers a delicate, sweet flavor that is milder than oregano. This dried herb pairs beautifully with poultry, vegetables, and tomato sauces for subtle Mediterranean-inspired cooking.

herbs.name: Tropical Heat - Mint
herbs.description: Tropical Heat dried mint delivers refreshing, cooling flavor to teas, yogurt sauces, and lamb dishes. This versatile cooking herb is perfect for Middle Eastern recipes and adds brightness to salads and traditional beverages.

herbs.name: Tropical Heat - Mixed Herbs
herbs.description: Tropical Heat mixed herbs combines oregano, basil, thyme, marjoram, and sage in one convenient Italian herbs blend. This aromatic mix simplifies your spice rack while delivering authentic flavor to pasta, pizza, and roasted meats.

herbs.name: Tropical Heat - Oregano
herbs.description: Tropical Heat oregano delivers robust, slightly peppery flavor that defines Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. This essential dried herb is more concentrated than fresh, making it perfect for tomato sauces, pizza, and grilled meats.

herbs.name: Tropical Heat - Parsley
herbs.description: Tropical Heat parsley adds mild, fresh flavor and vibrant green color to finished dishes. This versatile dried herb brightens soups, stews, and meat preparations while providing essential vitamins for healthy cooking.

herbs.name: Tropical Heat - Rosemary Leaves
herbs.description: Tropical Heat rosemary leaves offer intense, piney-aromatic flavor that transforms roasted lamb, beef, and potatoes. This potent dried herb pairs perfectly with grilled vegetables and brings depth to nyama choma marinades.

herbs.name: Tropical Heat - Sage
herbs.description: Tropical Heat sage delivers warm, earthy notes traditional in poultry stuffing, sausages, and pork dishes. This aromatic dried herb elevates brown butter sauces and brings classic European flavor to your cooking.

herbs.name: Tropical Heat - Thyme
herbs.description: Tropical Heat thyme brings subtle, earthy-minty flavor essential for Mediterranean cooking and French bouquet garni. This dried herb holds up through long cooking, making it perfect for roasted meats, vegetables, and stocks.

masalas.name: Tropical Heat - Beef Masala
masalas.description: Tropical Heat beef masala brings authentic Kenyan flavor to your beef curries and stews with coriander, cumin, and aromatic herbs. This pure spice blend contains no MSG and is FSSC 22000 certified for quality. Available in 100g jars.

masalas.name: Tropical Heat - Chicken Masala
masalas.description: Tropical Heat chicken masala combines coriander, cumin, turmeric, and aromatic spices for flavorful chicken dishes and marinades. This authentic Kenyan blend contains no MSG or artificial additives and is FSSC 22000 certified.

masalas.name: Tropical Heat - Chips Masala
masalas.description: Tropical Heat chips masala is Kenya's favorite fries seasoning, delivering that authentic street-food taste from Kenyan eateries. This aromatic blend of chili, cumin, and coriander transforms ordinary chips into a traditional Kenyan snack.

masalas.name: Tropical Heat - Curry Powder
masalas.description: Tropical Heat curry powder blends turmeric, coriander, cumin, and fenugreek for authentic Kenyan curries. This 100% natural spice mix contains no MSG or preservatives and is FSSC 22000 certified for trusted quality.

masalas.name: Tropical Heat - Fish Masala
masalas.description: Tropical Heat fish masala balances coriander, cumin, turmeric, and coastal spices to enhance seafood without overpowering it. This MSG-free blend is perfect for traditional Kenyan fish dishes and is FSSC 22000 certified.

masalas.name: Tropical Heat - Githeri Masala
masalas.description: Tropical Heat githeri masala is crafted specifically for Kenya's beloved traditional beans and maize dish. This all-natural blend of coriander, cumin, turmeric, and aromatic spices contains no artificial additives.

grinders.name: Tropical Heat - Black Peppercorn
grinders.description: Tropical Heat black peppercorn grinder delivers fresh-ground pepper with superior aromatic flavor for your nyama choma and everyday cooking. This 100ml refillable grinder with adjustable settings keeps your pure spices at peak freshness.

grinders.name: Tropical Heat - Fireball
grinders.description: Tropical Heat Fireball grinder combines black peppercorns, white peppercorns, chillies, and ginger for intense heat with complex flavor. This aromatic blend in a convenient 100ml grinder is perfect for those who love bold, spicy dishes.

grinders.name: Tropical Heat - Himalayan Pink Salt
grinders.description: Tropical Heat Himalayan pink salt grinder features mineral-rich salt from ancient sea deposits with subtle flavor complexity. This 100ml refillable grinder delivers pure, natural seasoning as a finishing touch to your dishes.

grinders.name: Tropical Heat - Mixed Spice Whole
grinders.description: Tropical Heat mixed spice whole grinder combines sea salt, sesame seeds, black pepper, and aromatic spices in one convenient 100ml grinder. Perfect for adding traditional recipe flavor to meats, stews, soups, and curries.

grinders.name: Tropical Heat - Pepper Medley Whole
grinders.description: Tropical Heat pepper medley grinder blends black peppercorns, white peppercorns, coriander seeds, and allspice for multi-dimensional flavor. This 100ml aromatic grinder elevates steaks, roasts, and grilled nyama choma.

grinders.name: Tropical Heat - Sea Salt Whole
grinders.description: Tropical Heat sea salt grinder contains pure sea salt with trace minerals from evaporated seawater for cleaner flavor than processed table salt. This 100ml refillable grinder offers adjustable coarseness for versatile cooking.

pops.name: Tropical Heat - Popped Nachos Salted
pops.description: Tropical Heat Popped Nachos deliver satisfying crunch with zero cholesterol, air-popped from rice and corn with premium Himalayan pink salt. These light, crunchy snacks are perfect for health-conscious snacking at the office or school. Available in convenient 22g and sharing 120g sizes.

pops.name: Tropical Heat - Popped Nachos Tomato
pops.description: Enjoy the tangy tomato burst of Tropical Heat air-popped nachos, a cholesterol-free alternative to traditional fried snacks. These Kenyan crisps offer bold flavour with less oil, making them ideal party snacks or everyday treats. Available in 22g pocket packs and 120g family formats.

pops.name: Tropical Heat - Popped Nachos Cheese
pops.description: Tropical Heat Cheese Popped Nachos combine rich cheese flavour with air-popped lightness for guilt-free crunchy snacks. Perfect for kids lunchboxes, office breaks, or movie nights without the heaviness of fried chips. Available in 22g and 120g sizes for individual or sharing occasions.

pops.name: Tropical Heat - Popped Nachos Chilli Lime
pops.description: Experience the zesty kick of Tropical Heat Chilli Lime Popped Nachos, combining tangy citrus with spicy heat on cholesterol-free air-popped corn and rice. These crunchy snacks bring bold East African flavour to parties, picnics, and everyday snacking. Available in 22g and 120g packs.

banana-crips.name: Tropical Heat - Banana Crips Salted
banana-crips.description: Tropical Heat Banana Crips showcase hand-picked Kenyan Matoke bananas, gently fried to create uniquely crunchy snacks with natural sweetness and light salt. These authentic Kenyan crisps support local farmers while delivering delicious party snacks everyone loves. Available in convenient 40g packs.

banana-crips.name: Tropical Heat - Banana Crips Chilli Lemon
banana-crips.description: Tropical Heat Chilli Lemon Banana Crips blend Kenyan Matoke bananas with zesty lemon, fiery chilli, and aromatic turmeric for an unforgettable flavour experience. Made with no added preservatives, these crunchy snacks offer a wholesome alternative to ordinary party snacks.

banana-crips.name: Tropical Heat - Banana Crips Chilli Salted
banana-crips.description: Discover the perfect balance of natural Matoke banana sweetness and fiery chilli heat in Tropical Heat Banana Crips. Hand-picked from Kenyan farms, these cholesterol-free crunchy snacks support local agriculture while satisfying your craving for bold, spicy party snacks. 40g packs available.

heroes.name: Tropical Heat - Heroes Chilli Cheese
heroes.description: Tropical Heat Heroes Chilli Cheese combines creamy cheese with fiery heat on hand-picked Kenyan potatoes, gently fried for the perfect crunch. These premium Kenyan crisps come in 110g sharing packs, ideal for parties and gatherings. Every purchase supports vital community initiatives across Kenya.

heroes.name: Tropical Heat - Heroes Salted
heroes.description: Tropical Heat Heroes Classic Salted showcases 47 years of crisp-making expertise with hand-picked Kenyan potatoes and just the right amount of salt. These golden, crunchy snacks are perfect for any occasion, from school lunches to party platters. 110g packs support six community pillars.

heroes.name: Tropical Heat - Heroes Sweet Chilli
heroes.description: Tropical Heat Heroes Sweet Chilli delivers the perfect harmony of heat and sweetness on premium Kenyan potato crisps. These crunchy snacks are crowd favourites at parties and gatherings, with every 110g pack contributing to community development initiatives across Kenya.

heroes.name: Tropical Heat - Heroes Fruit Chutney
heroes.description: Experience authentic East African flavour with Tropical Heat Heroes Fruit Chutney, featuring sweet-tangy chutney on hand-picked Kenyan crisps. These uniquely flavoured crunchy snacks bring local taste to parties and celebrations. 110g sharing packs support community programmes.

heroes.name: Tropical Heat - Heroes Salt & Vinegar
heroes.description: Tropical Heat Heroes Salt and Vinegar delivers bold, tangy flavour on premium Kenyan potato crisps, backed by 47 years of snack-making heritage. Perfect for those who love intense, crunchy snacks at parties or solo snacking. Wholesale cartons of 24 available for retailers.

heroes.name: Tropical Heat - Heroes Cheese & Onion
heroes.description: Tropical Heat Heroes Cheese and Onion offers the classic combination on FSSC 22000 certified Kenyan crisps, ensuring premium quality in every bite. These beloved crunchy snacks are perfect for party platters, office gatherings, and everyday treats. 110g sharing packs available.

heroes.name: Tropical Heat - Heroes Tomato Ketchup
heroes.description: Tropical Heat Heroes Tomato Ketchup brings that beloved sweet-tangy ketchup taste to hand-picked Kenyan potato crisps. A favourite among kids and adults alike, these crunchy snacks are ideal for school lunches, parties, and snack time. 110g packs support community causes.

waves.name: Tropical Heat - Waves Fruit Chutney
waves.description: Tropical Heat Waves Fruit Chutney features thick, ridged Kenyan crisps with authentic East African chutney flavour. These gluten-free, vegetarian crunchy snacks offer extra crunch perfect for dipping at parties. Available in 30g individual and 125g sharing packs.

waves.name: Tropical Heat - Waves Salted
waves.description: Tropical Heat Waves Salted delivers classic taste with extra crunch through thick, wavy ridges on premium Kenyan potato crisps. Gluten-free and vegetarian, these crunchy snacks are perfect for parties, picnics, and everyday munching. Available in 30g and 125g sizes.

waves.name: Tropical Heat - Waves Salt & Vinegar
waves.description: Tropical Heat Waves Salt and Vinegar packs bold, tangy punch into thick ridged Kenyan crisps that hold their crunch. These gluten-free crunchy snacks satisfy intense flavour cravings at parties or solo snacking sessions. Available in 30g pocket and 125g sharing formats.

waves.name: Tropical Heat - Waves Chilli Lemon
waves.description: Tropical Heat Waves Chilli Lemon brings East Africa's favourite flavour combination to thick, wavy Kenyan crisps with satisfying crunch. Gluten-free and vegetarian, these zesty crunchy snacks are party favourites across Kenya. Available in 30g and 125g sizes.

waves.name: Tropical Heat - Waves Tomato
waves.description: Tropical Heat Waves Tomato offers savoury tomato goodness on thick, ridged Kenyan potato crisps with superior crunch. These gluten-free crunchy snacks are perfect for kids lunchboxes, office breaks, and party snack bowls. Available in 30g and 125g packs.

potato-crisps.name: Tropical Heat - Potato Crisps Sweet Paprika
potato-crisps.description: Tropical Heat Sweet Paprika Potato Crisps bring mild, aromatic paprika to thin, crispy Kenyan chips backed by 50 years of snack expertise. These gluten-free, vegetarian crunchy snacks are perfect for parties and everyday enjoyment. Available from 50g to 400g sizes.

potato-crisps.name: Tropical Heat - Potato Crisps Salted
potato-crisps.description: Tropical Heat Classic Salted Potato Crisps represent the foundation of Kenya's favourite crisp brand, delivering timeless taste in every thin, crunchy bite. Perfect for parties, school lunches, and snack time. Wholesale cartons of 24-48 available in sizes from 50g to 400g.

potato-crisps.name: Tropical Heat - Potato Crisps Cheese & Onion
potato-crisps.description: Tropical Heat Cheese and Onion Potato Crisps combine creamy cheese with savoury onion on thin, crispy Kenyan chips, crafted with 50 years of manufacturing excellence. These beloved crunchy snacks suit every occasion from office breaks to party platters. 50g to 400g sizes.

potato-crisps.name: Tropical Heat - Potato Crisps Salt & Vinegar
potato-crisps.description: Tropical Heat Salt and Vinegar delivers bold, tangy flavour that has made it one of Kenya's top 3 local crisp brands. These thin, crunchy snacks satisfy intense flavour cravings at parties and snack time. Wholesale cartons of 24 in sizes from 25g to 400g.

potato-crisps.name: Tropical Heat - Potato Crisps Chilli Lemon
potato-crisps.description: Tropical Heat Chilli Lemon Potato Crisps capture East Africa's favourite flavour profile with zesty citrus and spicy kick on thin, gluten-free Kenyan crisps. These crunchy snacks are party favourites across the region. Available in sizes from 50g to 400g.

potato-crisps.name: Tropical Heat - Potato Crisps Tomato
potato-crisps.description: Tropical Heat Tomato Potato Crisps have been a customer favourite for decades, delivering savoury tomato taste on thin, crispy chips backed by 50 years of quality. Perfect crunchy snacks for kids, parties, and everyday enjoyment. 50g to 400g sizes available.

potato-crisps.name: Tropical Heat - Potato Crisps Nyama Choma
potato-crisps.description: Tropical Heat Nyama Choma Potato Crisps bring Kenya's beloved BBQ flavour to gluten-free, vegetarian thin crisps. These distinctly Kenyan crunchy snacks capture the taste of traditional grilled meat, perfect for parties and local flavour lovers. Wholesale cartons of 48x50g.

potato-crisps.name: Tropical Heat - Masala Sticks
potato-crisps.description: Tropical Heat Masala Sticks deliver Indian-inspired spice blends on crispy potato sticks, continuing a heritage that began as a cottage industry in 1973. These unique crunchy snacks stand out from regular Kenyan crisps, perfect for parties and ethnic food enthusiasts.

tropnuts.name: Tropical Heat - Masala Bhajia Peanuts
tropnuts.description: Tropical Heat Masala Bhajia Peanuts feature roasted karanga coated in aromatic bhajia-style masala with gram flour and spices, celebrating East African-Indian cuisine. These protein-packed crunchy snacks are gluten-free and perfect for parties or healthy office snacking. 50g and 150g sizes.

tropnuts.name: Tropical Heat - Fried Peanuts
tropnuts.description: Tropical Heat Fried Peanuts from the TropNuts range deliver classic roasted karanga with satisfying crunch and natural protein. These versatile snacks work perfectly for parties, office breaks, or anytime you need a wholesome protein snack. Multiple sizes available.

tropnuts.name: Tropical Heat - Chilli Lemon Peanuts
tropnuts.description: Tropical Heat Chilli Lemon Peanuts combine roasted karanga with East Africa's favourite tangy-spicy seasoning for irresistible crunchy snacks. These protein-rich roasted peanuts are perfect for parties, picnics, and bold flavour lovers. Available in 50g and 150g sizes.

tropnuts.name: Tropical Heat - Roasted Salted Peanuts
tropnuts.description: Tropical Heat Roasted Salted Peanuts offer quality karanga with light seasoning for classic taste and natural protein. These TropNuts favourites make excellent party snacks, office treats, or healthy between-meal protein snacks. Available in 50g and 150g sizes.

tropnuts.name: Tropical Heat - Fried Peas
tropnuts.description: Tropical Heat Fried Peas deliver satisfying crunch with higher protein than traditional potato snacks, making them a smart choice for health-conscious snackers. These crunchy green pea snacks from TropNuts are perfect for parties, office breaks, and nutritious munching.

tropnuts.name: Tropical Heat - Roasted Peanuts
tropnuts.description: Tropical Heat Dry Roasted Peanuts offer pure karanga flavour without added oil, delivering wholesome protein in every crunchy bite. These cholesterol-free TropNuts snacks are perfect for health-conscious consumers and natural peanut lovers. 150g packs available.

tropnuts.name: Tropical Heat - Exotic Nut Mix
tropnuts.description: Tropical Heat Exotic Nut Mix combines premium cashews, almonds, and select nuts for an upmarket protein snack experience. This sophisticated TropNuts blend is perfect for parties, corporate events, and those seeking quality crunchy snacks with superior nutrition.

ethnic-snacks.name: Tropical Heat - Chevda Original
ethnic-snacks.description: Tropical Heat Chevda Original blends Kenyan sweet potatoes, puffed rice, lentils, peanuts, and cashews in cholesterol-free corn oil with a secret spice blend. This authentic Indian snacks Kenya favourite supports local farmers and delivers irresistible crunch for parties and gatherings. 50g, 150g, and 340g sizes.

ethnic-snacks.name: Tropical Heat - Chevda Hot
ethnic-snacks.description: Tropical Heat Chevda Hot brings bold chilli heat to the classic Indian snacks Kenya recipe featuring sweet potatoes, puffed rice, yellow gram, and premium nuts in cholesterol-free corn oil. These spicy crunchy snacks are party favourites for those who love heat. Multiple pack sizes.

ethnic-snacks.name: Tropical Heat - Chevda Chilli Lemon
ethnic-snacks.description: Tropical Heat Chevda Chilli Lemon combines tangy citrus with spicy kick on the beloved Indian snacks Kenya mix of potatoes, puffed rice, lentils, and nuts. Fried in cholesterol-free corn oil, these crunchy snacks add zest to any party or gathering.

ethnic-snacks.name: Tropical Heat - Chevda No Sugar Added
ethnic-snacks.description: Tropical Heat Chevda No Sugar Added delivers the same beloved Indian snacks Kenya taste without added sugars, perfect for diabetic-friendly diets. Made with Kenyan potatoes, puffed rice, pulses, and nuts in cholesterol-free corn oil for health-conscious snacking.

ethnic-snacks.name: Tropical Heat - Chevda Masala
ethnic-snacks.description: Tropical Heat Chevda Masala features authentic Indian snacks Kenya seasoning with curry leaves, cumin, and coriander on Kenyan potatoes, puffed rice, and nuts. These aromatic crunchy snacks are perfect for parties, Diwali celebrations, and everyday indulgence. Bulk formats available.

ethnic-snacks.name: Tropical Heat - Chevda Mild
ethnic-snacks.description: Tropical Heat Chevda Mild offers gentle seasoning on the nutritious Indian snacks Kenya blend of potatoes, puffed rice, lentils, and cashews, perfect for kids and spice-sensitive eaters. These family-friendly crunchy snacks are ideal for school lunches and parties.

ethnic-snacks.name: Tropical Heat - Chevda Sweet Tamu
ethnic-snacks.description: Tropical Heat Chevda Sweet Tamu celebrates the natural sweetness of Kenyan potatoes in this unique Indian snacks Kenya blend with puffed rice, pulses, and nuts. These sweet-savoury crunchy snacks offer a distinctive taste experience for parties and dessert alternatives.

ethnic-snacks.name: Tropical Heat - Nairobi Mix Bhusu
ethnic-snacks.description: Tropical Heat Nairobi Mix Bhusu celebrates Kenya's diverse culinary heritage with green gram, masoor lentils, pressed rice, peas, and cashews in aromatic spices. This signature Indian snacks Kenya creation delivers authentic local flavour for parties and gatherings. 340g packages.

safari-puffs.name: Tropical Heat - Safari Puffs Chilli Lemon
safari-puffs.description: Tropical Heat Safari Puffs Chilli Lemon feature fun animal paw shapes with zesty citrus-chilli flavour, baked not fried for only 108 calories per pack. These gluten-free, trans-fat-free crunchy snacks are perfect for kids lunchboxes and party treats. 18g to 100g sizes.

safari-puffs.name: Tropical Heat - Safari Puffs Cheese
safari-puffs.description: Tropical Heat Safari Puffs Cheese delight kids with fun animal paw shapes and rich cheese flavour, baked for just 108 calories per 20g serving. These gluten-free, trans-fat-free crunchy snacks are perfect for school lunches and party snack bowls. 18g to 100g sizes.

safari-puffs.name: Tropical Heat - Safari Puffs Tomato
safari-puffs.description: Tropical Heat Safari Puffs Tomato bring savoury tomato flavour to fun animal paw-shaped corn puffs, baked for only 108 calories per pack. These gluten-free crunchy snacks are kid-approved party favourites and lunchbox staples. Available in 18g to 100g sizes.

safari-puffs.name: Tropical Heat - Safari Puffs Barbeque
safari-puffs.description: Tropical Heat Safari Puffs Barbeque offer smoky BBQ flavour on fun animal paw shapes, baked not fried for just 108 calories per 20g. These gluten-free, trans-fat-free crunchy snacks are perfect for parties, picnics, and kids snack time. 18g to 100g sizes.

rice-cakes.name: Tropical Heat - Chocolate Rice Cakes
rice-cakes.description: Tropical Heat Chocolate Rice Cakes combine crispy whole grain rice with smooth milk chocolate coating for a healthy snacks treat under 100 calories. These gluten-free, trans-fat-free low calorie cakes satisfy sweet cravings guilt-free. 150g packages available.

rice-cakes.name: Tropical Heat - Rice Cakes Unsalted
rice-cakes.description: Tropical Heat Unsalted Rice Cakes offer a perfect gluten-free alternative canvas at only 35 calories each, ideal for topping with nut butter, avocado, or hummus. These low calorie healthy snacks support mindful eating and creative recipes. 100g and 120g sizes.

rice-cakes.name: Tropical Heat - Rice Cakes Salted
rice-cakes.description: Tropical Heat Salted Rice Cakes deliver satisfying crunch with just 35 calories per piece, packed with fibre, magnesium, and B vitamins. These gluten-free, trans-fat-free healthy snacks are the perfect low calorie alternative to chips. Multiple sizes available.

rice-cakes.name: Tropical Heat - Rice Cakes Brown Rice
rice-cakes.description: Tropical Heat Brown Rice Cakes retain the bran and germ for maximum fibre and nutrients, making them superior healthy snacks for blood sugar management. At only 35 calories each, these gluten-free alternative cakes support wellness goals deliciously.

rice-cakes.name: Tropical Heat - Rice Cakes Salt & Vinegar
rice-cakes.description: Tropical Heat Salt and Vinegar Rice Cakes bring bold chip flavour to low calorie healthy snacks at just 35 calories per piece. These gluten-free, trans-fat-free cakes offer all the tangy taste without the guilt, perfect for mindful snacking.

rice-cakes.name: Tropical Heat - Rice Cakes Cheese
rice-cakes.description: Tropical Heat Cheese Rice Cakes deliver savoury cheese satisfaction on whole grain healthy snacks at only 35 calories per cake. Gluten-free and vegetarian, these low calorie treats are perfect for office breaks and kids snacks. 165g packages of 12.

rice-cakes.name: Tropical Heat - Rice Cakes Fruit Chutney
rice-cakes.description: Tropical Heat Fruit Chutney Rice Cakes combine sweet-savoury tropical flavour with Kenyan heritage on gluten-free healthy snacks at just 35 calories each. These distinctly local low calorie cakes offer unique taste as a gluten-free alternative to traditional snacks.
